title: Shooting accidental
content:
A Marietta, Ga. teen remains in the hospital following an accidental shooting at a rental home on White Oak Drive in the Warne community.
At about 8 a.m. Nov. 25, Savion Smith was asleep when a stray bullet from a 9 mm semi-automatic handgun struck the back of his head, according to Sgt. Dan Sherrill with the Clay County Sheriff’s Office.
The bullet originated from another bedroom of the vacation house where about 12 family members and friends were staying for a Thanksgiving gathering, Sherrill said.
William Cooley, of McDonough, Ga. was in the process of disabling the 9 mm gun when it fired. “In those type of guns you have to pull the trigger to take the slide off,” Sherill said. “He didn’t think it was loaded. When he pulled the trigger it went off.”
